isDateString: {property} must be a valid ISO 8601 date string
base64Size: Bytes of {property} must not be greater than {constraint1}
isNumber: {property} must be a number conforming to the specified constraints
isIn: {property} must be one of the following values: {constraint1}
minLength: {property} must be shorter than or equal to {constraint1} characters
maxLength: {property} must be longer than or equal to {constraint1} characters
